snippet: Bill Gross, head of the bond giant Pimco, is at a crossroad, Reuters reports, after a bad year for the legendary manager's top fund and as regulators consider whether to designate his West Coast firm "too big to fail."
abstract: Bill Gross, head of the bond giant Pimco, is at a crossroad, Reuters reports, after a bad year for the legendary manager's top fund and as regulators consider whether to designate his West Coast firm "too big to fail."

headline.main: A Bond King at a Crossroad
